author: zsfelfoldi
content:
Unfortunately the available docs are pretty ancient (from around devcon5 where I first presented the theories):
https://github.com/zsfelfoldi/incentives
Since then there was a lot of progress with the implementation, though as it usually happens with these things the devil in the details made it harder than it originally appeared ðŸ™‚ So now a few things are different but I am currently working on some new docs, I'll upload them in the same repo. Now the ETA for test operation on Rinkeby is Q3 2021.
